duties_responsibilities.duty: Design, develop, test, and deploy custom applications and integrations using Salesforce and other relevant technologies.
Implement and maintain EDI integrations, mapping and transforming data between systems using EDI standards such as ANSI X12 or EDIFACT.
Customize and extend the functionality of the Salesforce platform using Apex, Visualforce, and Lightning components.
Design and implement data integration solutions, extracting, transforming, and loading data between various systems and databases.
Conduct unit testing, integration testing, and performance testing of developed applications and integrations.
Create and maintain technical documentation, including system designs, specifications, and user guides.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather requirements, define specifications, and develop technical solutions that meet business needs.
Troubleshoot and resolve issues in existing applications and integrations, providing timely support and maintenance.
Collaborate with stakeholders, external partners, and internal teams to implement and test EDI transactions and troubleshoot integration issues.
Integrate external systems and data sources with Salesforce, ensuring data integrity and seamless flow of information.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field.
